channel.title: code snippets on Juraj Rusnačko
channel.description: Recent content in code snippets on Juraj Rusnačko

item.title: Branching in Git
item.description: Create a new branch and switch to it: 1 git checkout -b newbranch Track a local branch with a remote: 1 git push -u origin newbranch After the work is done, merge a branch into master: 1 2 git checkout master git merge newbranch Delete local branch: 1 git branch -d newbranch Delete remote branch: 1 git push origin --delete newbranch After deleting the remote branch, run this on all other machines to update references to deleted branches:

item.title: Using Git diff
item.description: Simply running 1 git diff shows changes not currently staged for commit. To show the staged changes, do 1 git diff --cached The overview of changes across the repo can be gained by 1 git diff --stat To set up vimdiff with git, run 1 2 3 git config --global diff.tool vimdiff git config --global merge.tool vimdiff git config --global difftool.
